name: Cube Game (FREE)
description:
This is a little game I've been working on to tune a movement controller. Join the development process at the Me Games Youtube or instagram.

How To Play

Avoid being smashed by the bricks and collect as many points as possible. Gain points by gathering the small yellow collectible cubes or performing a slam down on larger yellow.

Controls

Movement: Left/Right Arrow Keys

Jump: Up Arrow (Hold)

Slam Down: Down Arrow (Hold in air)

Restart level: Escape (Tap)

Quit Game: Escape (Hold)

Development

Join the community, pitch a feature, it may just be built

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHiEegD2-mCPpNQdrawLojg?view_as=subscriber

https://www.instagram.com/me.games.dev/
